class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/impact-com-performance/reviews/impact-com-performance-review-10040851"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"I love impact!"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Impact is amazing because it's super easy to use. They work with legitimate brands, so you don't have to worry about any type of scams. They track your progress and provide resources for you to learn. I would definitely recommend Impact to friends. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">The only thing I'd say is it would be cool to add a feature where affiliates have the ability to customize our affiliate links, like maybe adding our names to the end of it. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-10040851 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Impact.com/Performance makes managing partnerships easier by bringing everything into one place, so you save time and avoid confusion. It helps protect you from scams by working with trusted brands. You can track how well your campaigns are doing and make improvements with the platform’s easy-to-use tools. It also offers helpful resources to teach you more about affiliate marketing. Plus, you can customize your affiliate links, which makes your work look more professional. Overall, it helps you do better in affiliate marketing with less effort. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-08-17" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-08-17">Aug 17, 2024</time></span><span class="text-small mb-1 ml-half 2024</time>)</a><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 512 512" class="align-middle ml-4th icon-help-circled nessy-only x-tooltip-initialized top" ue="tooltip" title="" aria-labelledby="icon-label-bc4342742156e40d2e529a1ba8c5c164" role="img" aria-describedby="5n57fi-tooltip" data-yeti-box="5n57fi-tooltip" data-toggle="5n57fi-tooltip" data-resize="5n57fi-tooltip" data-tooltip="s92vu7-tooltip"><title id="icon-label-bc4342742156e40d2e529a1ba8c5c164">Information</title><path d="M253 20c65 0 120 22 167 67 46 45 70 100 72 165 0 65-22 121-68 167-45 47-100 71-165 73-65 0-121-22-167-68-47-45-71-100-72-165S41 138 87 92c46-47 101-71 166-72m-1 379c10 0 19-3 25-9 6-7 10-15 10-24 0-11-2-19-9-26-6-6-15-9-25-9h-1c-10 0-18 3-24 9-7 6-10 14-11 24 0 10 3 18 10 25 6 6 14 10 24 10h1m85-168c9-11 13-24 13-40 0-26-9-46-27-59s-41-19-69-19c-22 0-40 4-53 13-24 14-36 39-37 75v2h56v-2c0-9 3-18 8-28 6-8 15-12 28-12 14 0 23 3 27 10 5 7 8 14 8 23 0 6-3 13-8 20-3 4-7 8-11 10l-3 2c-2 2-4 4-8 6-3 2-7 5-10 8-4 2-7 5-11 8s-7 6-9 9c-4 7-7 20-9 40v4h56v-2c0-4 0-9 2-14 2-7 6-13 14-19l14-9c16-12 25-20 29-26"></path></svg></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/impact-com-performance/reviews/impact-com-performance-review-9936078"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Partnerships hold a significant importance."</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">The content is both enlightening and educational, expertly crafted to provide valuable insights. The site's navigation is intuitive, and the customer service and tutorials are truly priceless. We greatly appreciate Impact for its significant educational contribution to its Affiliates. Once you grasp what works and what doesn't, analytics become incredibly helpful. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Creating unique artwork is often necessary for certain advertisers, and it may require extra effort from content creators for a modest commission. In such cases, leveraging email marketing can be beneficial, particularly with a well-qualified list. It may be worth considering whether adjusting the commission percentages could be helpful. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">Additionally, I recall a situation where we spent a significant amount of time in pending status with an advertiser before ultimately declining the opportunity. It wasn't a definitive "No," but it also didn't align with a clear "Yes." It was a complex and nuanced decision." <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9936078 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Affiliate marketing, the value of good partnerships, The significance of affiliate marketing and fostering strong partnerships cannot be overstated. Enhancing these partnerships is crucial for success.and how to make them better. Partnerships hold significant importance. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more This reviewer was not provided any incentive by G2 for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: In-app</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-29" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-29">Jul 29, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/impact-com-performance/reviews/impact-com-performance-review-9933640"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"The IMP Advertising Alliance is undoubtedly the engine leading the future direction of advertising."</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">I particularly like the open collaboration and cross-border communication characteristics of the IMP Advertising Alliance. This feature not only promotes innovation and technological advancement, but also provides members with invaluable resource sharing and learning opportunities. Through the exchange and cooperation of experts in different fields, the IMP Advertising Alliance not only promotes the development of the advertising industry, but also promotes collaboration and coordination in all aspects of the industry. This open culture of collaboration not only enables alliance members to stay ahead of the competition in the market, but also provides strong support for solving industry challenges and facing new opportunities. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">The validation process for IMP Advertising alliances can take time, which can affect some urgent projects or situations that require quick decisions. In a competitive market environment, the ability to respond quickly and execute is particularly important. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9933640 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Increase sales and revenue: Through effective partner marketing and affiliate programs, businesses are able to attract more traffic and leads, resulting in increased sales and revenue. Impact.com provides data analytics and optimization tools to help businesses identify and scale effective partnerships to maximize their marketing ROI. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click x-toggle-class-initialized" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" data-container="body" title="Organic review. This review was written entirely without invitation or incentive from G2, a seller, or an affiliate." ue="tooltip">Review source: Organic</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-0"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-07" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-07">Jul 07, 2024</time></span><span class="text-small mb-1 ml-half show-for-large x-original-review-date"><a class="color-dark-gray" href="https://www.g2.com/products/impact-com-performance/reviews/impact-com-performance-review-9854773?original=impact-com-performance-review-9854773">(Original <time datetime="2024-07-07">Jul 01, 2024</time>)</a><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 512 512" class="align-middle ml-4th icon-help-circled nessy-only" ue="tooltip" title="At G2, we prefer fresh reviews and we like to follow up with reviewers. They may not have updated their review text, but have updated their review." aria-labelledby="icon-label-90b4f2457c2fa3bab28160ad0859af06" role="img"><title id="icon-label-90b4f2457c2fa3bab28160ad0859af06">Information</title><path d="M253 20c65 0 120 22 167 67 46 45 70 100 72 165 0 65-22 121-68 167-45 47-100 71-165 73-65 0-121-22-167-68-47-45-71-100-72-165S41 138 87 92c46-47 101-71 166-72m-1 379c10 0 19-3 25-9 6-7 10-15 10-24 0-11-2-19-9-26-6-6-15-9-25-9h-1c-10 0-18 3-24 9-7 6-10 14-11 24 0 10 3 18 10 25 6 6 14 10 24 10h1m85-168c9-11 13-24 13-40 0-26-9-46-27-59s-41-19-69-19c-22 0-40 4-53 13-24 14-36 39-37 75v2h56v-2c0-9 3-18 8-28 6-8 15-12 28-12 14 0 23 3 27 10 5 7 8 14 8 23 0 6-3 13-8 20-3 4-7 8-11 10l-3 2c-2 2-4 4-8 6-3 2-7 5-10 8-4 2-7 5-11 8s-7 6-9 9c-4 7-7 20-9 40v4h56v-2c0-4 0-9 2-14 2-7 6-13 14-19l14-9c16-12 25-20 29-26"></path></svg></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/impact-com-performance/reviews/impact-com-performance-review-9854773"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Ton of fraud and terrible customer support"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">My company started trying affiliates as a channel earlier this year. We heard Impact was a good reliable platform for people getting started. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">The platform is All Fraud. And customer support is nonexistent. Expect to get a form response weeks after writing in for help--as a new customer. Never had such a terrible support experience. It's like customer success is non-existent. I was warned by other tech companies not to use them and now I know why. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9854773 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Finding affiliate partners  (Channel expansion for growth) <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click data-product-admin-id="19813" data-product-admin-model="Product" ue="product-admin"><a class="edit-hook float-right" href="https://www.g2.com/survey_responses/impact-com-performance-review-9854773/official_response/edit"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 512 512" class="icon-edit nessy-only" aria-labelledby="icon-label-143ebfe38016ebf8011c315c30ce5ed0" role="img"><title id="icon-label-143ebfe38016ebf8011c315c30ce5ed0">Edit</title><path d="M254 338l33-33-44-43-33 33v16h28v27zm125-205c-3-3-6-3-9 0L270 233c-3 3-3 6 0 9s6 3 9 0l100-100c3-3 3-6 0-9zm23 169v55c0 22-8 42-24 58s-35 24-58 24H82c-22 0-42-8-58-24S0 379 0 357V119c0-23 8-42 24-58s36-24 58-24h238c12 0 23 2 33 7 3 1 5 3 6 6 0 4-1 6-3 9l-14 14c-3 2-6 3-9 2-5-1-9-2-13-2H82c-12 0-23 5-32 14s-13 19-13 32v238c0 12 4 23 13 32s20 13 32 13h238c13 0 23-4 32-13s14-20 14-32v-36c0-3 1-5 2-7l19-18c2-3 6-4 10-2 3 2 5 4 5 8zM375 91l82 83-192 192h-82v-83zm127 38l-27 26-82-82 26-26c6-5 12-8 20-8 7 0 14 3 19 8l44 43c5 6 8 12 8 20 0 7-3 14-8 19z"></path></svg><span class="ml-4th">edit</span></a></div></div><span><span data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-08" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-08">Jul 08, 2024</time></span></span><p class="formatted-text">Hi Allie, I'm sorry to hear of your poor experience. We always aim to provide the support our customers need. If you'd like to discuss the struggles you're facing further, please feel free to reach out to customermarketing@impact.com, and we'll be happy to connect you with the proper team members. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">As a new customer, we also encourage you to check out our Partnerships Experience Academy, where you can find step-by-step tutorials on how to use the platform in various ways. You can find the login here, and it is free to you as an impact.com customer: https://impact.com/partnerships-experience-academy/
</p><p class="formatted-text">

</p><p class="formatted-text">The platform allows for a high degree of customization to tailor solutions to specific business needs. Whether you're managing affiliate programs or influencer campaigns, you can adjust the tools and metrics to fit your goals. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">The platform provides deep insights into campaign performance, allowing for precise tracking and optimization based on comprehensive data. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-10009013 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">It solves the problem of fragmented data by consolidating performance metrics from various sources into a single, unified platform. This streamlines reporting and analysis, making it easier to get a comprehensive view of campaign effectiveness. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click x-toggle-class-initialized" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" However, users report issues with customer support and payment processing delays​ (Influencer Marketing Hub)​​ (The Full Hand)​​ (TrustRadius)​​ (SaaSworthy)​. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Impact.com's slow customer support, payment processing delays, and occasional onboarding difficulties are significant drawbacks, along with a steep learning curve for new users and a lack of transparent pricing​ (Influencer Marketing Hub)​​ (TrustRadius)​​ (SaaSworthy)​. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9924885 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Impact.com streamlines affiliate marketing by offering detailed analytics, robust tracking, and automated workflows. This benefits users by improving campaign efficiency, providing data-driven insights, and simplifying partnership management​ <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click x-toggle-class-initialized" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle" integrations. This reviewer was not provided any incentive by G2 for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: In-app</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-07-23" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-07-23">Jul 23, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/impact-com-performance/reviews/impact-com-performance-review-9914212"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"By far the best affiliation platform: IMPACT.COM"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">1. The API is nicely designed and always has pertinent data. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">2. The diversity of brands and programs makes it easy to find the right produts/services for your target audience.
</p><p class="formatted-text">3. All processes are automated and have nicely designed flows. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">The onboarding was super sticky but worth it once you are in.
</p><p class="formatted-text">Can't access non affiliated brand's products through the API. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9914212 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Aggregating the affiliation programs of many brands instead of managing each brand alone on their silo, Impact allows to connect and engage with brands in one-stop-platform with very clearly designed APIs with clean up-to-date data. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click data-container="body" title="This review was generated through an in-app integration or from one of G2's partnership integrations. This reviewer was not provided any incentive by G2 for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: In-app</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-7"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-02-21" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-02-21">Feb 21, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/impact-com-performance/reviews/impact-com-performance-review-9008699"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">""Navigating Growth: A Review of Impact.com's Partnership Journey"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">One of the standout features of Impact.com is its comprehensive suite of tools for managing partnerships. From tracking performance metrics to automating workflows, Impact.com offers a robust platform that streamlines the entire partnership process. Additionally, its intuitive interface and user-friendly design make it easy for both beginners and experienced users to navigate effectively. Overall, Impact.com's dedication to providing a seamless and efficient partnership management experience is what I appreciate most about the platform. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">While Impact.com offers many valuable features, one aspect that could be improved is the complexity of its pricing structure. The various pricing tiers and add-on features can be confusing to navigate, especially for smaller businesses or those with limited budgets. Simplifying the pricing model and providing clearer guidance on which features are included in each tier could enhance the user experience and make it easier for businesses to choose the plan that best suits their needs. Additionally, some users have reported occasional glitches or technical issues with the platform, although these seem to be relatively infrequent and are typically addressed promptly by the support team. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9008699 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Impact.com simplifies partnership management by centralizing tasks, providing detailed analytics, fostering better communication with partners, and ultimately increasing ROI through optimized processes. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div 512 512" class="icon-edit nessy-only" aria-labelledby="icon-label-ebe74e00e980222de119508255c8b01a" role="img"><title id="icon-label-ebe74e00e980222de119508255c8b01a">Edit</title><path d="M254 338l33-33-44-43-33 33v16h28v27zm125-205c-3-3-6-3-9 0L270 233c-3 3-3 6 0 9s6 3 9 0l100-100c3-3 3-6 0-9zm23 169v55c0 22-8 42-24 58s-35 24-58 24H82c-22 0-42-8-58-24S0 379 0 357V119c0-23 8-42 24-58s36-24 58-24h238c12 0 23 2 33 7 3 1 5 3 6 6 0 4-1 6-3 9l-14 14c-3 2-6 3-9 2-5-1-9-2-13-2H82c-12 0-23 5-32 14s-13 19-13 32v238c0 12 4 23 13 32s20 13 32 13h238c13 0 23-4 32-13s14-20 14-32v-36c0-3 1-5 2-7l19-18c2-3 6-4 10-2 3 2 5 4 5 8zM375 91l82 83-192 192h-82v-83zm127 38l-27 26-82-82 26-26c6-5 12-8 20-8 7 0 14 3 19 8l44 43c5 6 8 12 8 20 0 7-3 14-8 19z"></path></svg><span class="ml-4th">edit</span></a></div></div><span><span data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-02-22" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-02-22">Feb 22, 2024</time></span></span><p class="formatted-text">Hi there, thank you for the thoughtful review! I'm happy to hear you're benefiting from impact.com's robust tracking and reporting capabilities, as well as opportunities to automate your workflows to create efficiencies. 
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">I certainly understand your concerns around pricing, and I would be happy to connect you with a team member who can explain pricing and plans more plainly if that would be helpful to you.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">We'd love to hear more about how you're streamlining your partnership processes and overall program management. Please reach out to hannah.kirschner@impact.com so we can continue the conversation. Thanks again for your feedback, it is greatly appreciated.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="text-small full-width"><div class="border-top"></div><div class="d-f jc-c ai-c mb-0 fw-semibold"><div Support is not very helpfull in resolving my queries. viewBox="0 0 16 12" class="c-teal-100 tiny ml-half icon-checkmark-thick nessy-only" aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" role="presentation"><path d="M13.333 0L6.667 6.667l-4-4L0 5.333 6.667 12 16 2.667z"></path></svg></div></div><div class="tag" data-container="body" title="Organic review. This review was written entirely without invitation or incentive from G2, a seller, or an affiliate." ue="tooltip">Review source: Organic</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-0"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-01-16" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-01-16">Jan 16, 2024</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/impact-com-performance/reviews/impact-com-performance-review-9112803"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Attention Sellers: Avoid Impact.com – a Company on the Borderline of Scam!"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Absolutely nothing. It has been the worst experience I've had with a provider in my 20 years in the industry.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">If you are considering using Impact.com, thinking it could help you discover new affiliates (or "Partners," as they call it), think again. The vast majority of their partners hail from third-world countries, comprising scammers and providing the lowest possible quality. There is nothing positive that emerges from these affiliations. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">- Lowest quality partners, most from third-world countries
</p><p class="formatted-text">- Unbelievably poor customer support (at one point, it took them over a month to respond to me)
</p><p class="formatted-text">- Failure to address and combat abusive/scammer partners
</p><p class="formatted-text">- Attempted blackmail when I expressed a desire to leave – they demanded "bail" money just to close the program.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">I sincerely wish someone had warned me before I engaged with them as a seller. Be wise and steer clear! Look for the 1-star reviews to get insights from other sellers; most of the 4-5-star reviews are likely from affiliates. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9112803 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">It was supposed to assist in securing quality affiliates to promote our product, but it failed to do so. It turned out to be a complete disappointment. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c 2-5-1-9-2-13-2H82c-12 0-23 5-32 14s-13 19-13 32v238c0 12 4 23 13 32s20 13 32 13h238c13 0 23-4 32-13s14-20 14-32v-36c0-3 1-5 2-7l19-18c2-3 6-4 10-2 3 2 5 4 5 8zM375 91l82 83-192 192h-82v-83zm127 38l-27 26-82-82 26-26c6-5 12-8 20-8 7 0 14 3 19 8l44 43c5 6 8 12 8 20 0 7-3 14-8 19z"></path></svg><span class="ml-4th">edit</span></a></div></div><span><span data-poison-date=""><meta content="2024-01-23" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2024-01-23">Jan 23, 2024</time></span></span><p class="formatted-text">Hello, we're sorry to hear of your poor experience with the platform and our team. Although it sounds like you've already made your decision to no longer use impact.com, we'd love to connect so that we can constructively take any specific feedback you may have back to our team. User experience is of the utmost importance to us and we are open to any opportunities to improve. If you're open to it, please email hannah.kirschner@impact.com. </p></div></div></div></div><div class="text-small full-width"><div class="border-top"></div><div class="d-f jc-c ai-c mb-0 It stands out for its user-friendly interface and the ability to streamline affiliate program operations effectively. Many users appreciate its scalability and the support it provides for both advertisers and publishers, making it a preferred choice in the industry. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Customer Support: There are occasional complaints about the responsiveness and helpfulness of customer support. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9915529 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Real-time Data: The platform offers real-time analytics and reporting, allowing users to make informed decisions quickly and optimize their strategies. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: G2 invite</div><div class="tag" title="This reviewer was offered a nominal gift card as thank you for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Incentivized Review</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-10"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2023-12-11" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2023-12-11">Dec 11, 2023</time></span><span class="text-small mb-1 ml-half show-for-large x-original-review-date"><a class="color-dark-gray" href="https://www.g2.com/products/impact-com-performance/reviews/impact-com-performance-review-8976357?original=impact-com-performance-review-8976357">(Original <time datetime="2023-12-11">Dec 07, 2023</time>)</a><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" contain="paint" buffered-rendering="static" viewBox="0 0 512 512" class="align-middle ml-4th icon-help-circled nessy-only" ue="tooltip" title="At G2, we prefer fresh reviews and we like to follow up with reviewers. They may not have updated their review text, but have updated their review." aria-labelledby="icon-label-293a881c5c390f5c8a63b50370920120" role="img"><path d="M253 20c65 0 120 22 167 67 46 45 70 100 72 165 0 65-22 121-68 167-45 47-100 71-165 73-65 0-121-22-167-68-47-45-71-100-72-165S41 138 87 92c46-47 101-71 166-72m-1 379c10 0 19-3 25-9 6-7 10-15 10-24 0-11-2-19-9-26-6-6-15-9-25-9h-1c-10 0-18 3-24 9-7 6-10 14-11 24 0 10 3 18 10 25 6 6 14 10 24 10h1m85-168c9-11 13-24 13-40 0-26-9-46-27-59s-41-19-69-19c-22 0-40 4-53 13-24 14-36 39-37 75v2h56v-2c0-9 3-18 8-28 6-8 15-12 28-12 14 0 23 3 27 10 5 7 8 14 8 23 0 6-3 13-8 20-3 4-7 8-11 10l-3 2c-2 2-4 4-8 6-3 2-7 5-10 8-4 2-7 5-11 8s-7 6-9 9c-4 7-7 20-9 40v4h56v-2c0-4 0-9 2-14 2-7 6-13 14-19l14-9c16-12 25-20 29-26"></path></svg></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/impact-com-performance/reviews/impact-com-performance-review-8976357"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Most reliable and trusted affiliate network"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Impact dashboard is so simple and easy to use to launch your merchants on it and they give us full access and team support so we can't face any difficultiy to launch new products with them. It's the best thng with Impact network. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Maybe everything is so simple in Impact the thing to dislike is you may face difficulties in inviting affiliate partners to your launched programs on their marketplace. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-8976357 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Impact solves our problem of getting high quality affiliates in US region by providing easy to access to their traffic by inviting them on our programs through their newsletter. We don't have to reach them individually as most of the best affiliate accounts is available on Impact. Our all merchants are profitable on Impact. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c Generally Impact is more frustrating to use than it needs to be. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9673026 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">As an incentive publishers, we want to work with a wide range of advertisers and especially big name advertisers, so Impact does well on both counts, although finding suitable advertisers is not the easiest process due to a slow website and poor search filters. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click The platform allows me to easily manage and track my affiliate marketing campaigns, providing detailed analytics and real-time reporting. Additionally, impact.com offers a wide range of integration options, making it seamless to connect with various affiliate networks and partners. The customer support team is also highly responsive and helpful, ensuring any issues or questions are promptly addressed. Overall, impact.com has proven to be an invaluable tool for optimizing my affiliate marketing efforts. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Upon careful examination, I am unable to identify any discernible concerns or complications pertaining to the utilization of impact.com or the generation of affiliate income. It appears that both aspects are functioning seamlessly and without any notable hindrances. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9037273 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">For me, using Impact.com has been incredibly beneficial. It has streamlined my partnership management process, allowing me to easily track the performance of my affiliates and identify areas for improvement. The platform's robust analytics and reporting features have helped me make data-driven decisions and optimize my campaigns for better results.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">Overall, Impact.com has been a game-changer for me in terms of partnership management. It has saved me time and effort, while also helping me achieve better outcomes. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to enhance their affiliate marketing efforts. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex integrations. This reviewer was not provided any incentive by G2 for completing this review." ue="tooltip">Review source: In-app</div></div></div><div class="paper__bd"><div class="d-f mb-1"><div class="f-1 d-f ai-c mb-half-small-only"><div class="stars large xlarge--medium-down stars-8"></div><div class="time-stamp pl-4th ws-nw"><span><span class="x-current-review-date" data-poison-date=""><meta content="2023-12-17" itemprop="datePublished"><time datetime="2023-12-17">Dec 17, 2023</time></span></span></div></div></div><div class="d-f"><div class="f-1"><div data-poison=""><a class="pjax" href="https://www.g2.com/products/impact-com-performance/reviews/impact-com-performance-review-9022213"><div class="m-0 l2" itemprop="name">"Probably the most advanced affiliate network I have worked with"</div></a></div><div data-poison-text=""><div itemprop="reviewBody"><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you like best about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Started using impact radius after a program I worked with made a switch to impact radius.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">I love the fact that they allow you track every click and transaction or action on your affiliate link which is unlikely in most affiliate networks.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">They have one of the most comprehensive affiliate programs with lots of big names and brands you can work with in every niche.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">Their support is top notch too. With easy access to the different brands you work with and impact radius if you have any issues.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">Really enjoying my time using impact radius. Can't wait to see how I up my affiliate game with them. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div><div class="l5 mt-2">What do you dislike about impact.com/performance?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Nothing much so far. Need to keep using it to discover more cons. As for now I'm enjoying my stay here. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div><div class="expanded-review-9022213 is-hidden-default"><div class="l5 mt-2">What problems is impact.com/performance solving and how is that benefiting you?</div><div><p class="formatted-text">Tracking has been an issue. Now I can see every action on my affiliate link. This gives me confidence to promote without the fear of not being credited.
</p><p class="formatted-text">
</p><p class="formatted-text">The support is top notch too. The inbuilt chat feature that allows you to chat with brands make affiliate and brand relationship a lot easier. <span class="spht">Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="flex justify-between"><a class="link d-f ai-c x-show-more js-log-click x-toggle-class-initialized" ue="toggle-class login-modal-toggle"
